00010 #ifndef _SF_GUID_H__
00011 #define _SF_GUID_H__
00012 
00013 #include <memory.h>
00014 #include <iosfwd>
00015 
00016 
00017 namespace module
00018 {
00019 
00021 
00022 
00024 
00026         struct guid
00027         {
00029 
00030                 unsigned long  data1;
00031                 unsigned short data2;
00032                 unsigned short data3;
00033                 unsigned char  data4[ 8 ];
00035 
00037                 bool operator == (const guid& rhs) const
00038                 {
00039                         return data1 == rhs.data1
00040                                 && data2 == rhs.data2
00041                                 && data3 == rhs.data3
00042                                 && memcmp(data4, rhs.data4, sizeof(char)*8) == 0;
00043                 }
00044 
00046                 bool operator != (const guid& rhs) const
00047                 {
00048                         return !(this->operator ==(rhs));
00049                 }
00050 
00052                 bool operator < (const guid& rhs) const
00053                 {
00054                         // If guid first components are not equal -> return their comparison result
00055                         // Otherwise, proceed to the next component pair
00056                         // Continue for all components of guid
00057                         if( data1 != rhs.data1 )
00058                         {
00059                                 return data1 < rhs.data1;
00060                         }
00061 
00062                         if ( data2 != rhs.data2 )
00063                         {
00064                                 return data2 < rhs.data2;
00065                         }
00066 
00067                         if ( data3 != rhs.data3 )
00068                         {
00069                                 return data3 < rhs.data3;
00070                         }
00071 
00072                         for(int i = 0; i < 8; ++i)
00073                         {
00074                                 if ( data4[i] != rhs.data4[i] )
00075                                         return data4[i] < rhs.data4[i];
00076                         }
00077 
00078                         // Guids are equal
00079                         return false;
00080                 }
00081 
00083                 void reset()
00084                 {
00085                         memset(this, 0, sizeof(guid));
00086                 }
00087 
00089                 bool is_reset() const
00090                 {
00091                         guid zero;
00092                         zero.reset();
00093                         return *this == zero;
00094                 }
00095 
00096                 operator bool() const { return !is_reset(); }
00097 
00099                 bool parse(const char* s);
00100 
00102                 void to_string(char* buf) const;
00103 
00105 
00106                 static guid guid_from_string(const char* s)
00107                 {
00108                         guid g;
00109                         g.reset();
00110                         g.parse(s);
00111                         return g;
00112                 }
00113         };
00114 
00116 
00117         std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const guid& g);
00118 
00119         std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, guid& g);

00127         #define SF_RIID const module::guid&
